title: Animal migration
brief_description: Describes the migratory patterns of animals such as the mountain sheep, monarch butterfly, whale, elephant seal, salmon and arctic tern. Examines the reasons for animals migrating, the ways in which they navigate, and the scientific methods used to study migration. Suitable for upper primary and lower secondary levels.
